TopicTitle: why can't I turn off surface fx?

Articles.Content:
When I disable it, and press accept, or apply and accept, or any combination of those and return to the settings menu, or return to playing the game, surface FX is still enabled?? I need to turn it off as I can't continue playing with the frame rate being so low! (on my terrible laptop)

Any help, workaround, or fix would be great! Thanks all, this game ROCKS!

Anyone know if this is what is causing my problem with Surface FX, and how to fix it??? Thanks! Love this game and this community.

- - - Updated - - -

The "trench flame/smoke" I believe is from the "surface FX" option that I am struggling to turn off.

I've noticed this myself, and it is quite frustrating. If anyone can find a solution, please put it here.

I'm going to take a peek at the settings.cfg file, to see if it can be changed there.

Ah SO! I figured out that you can change the "settings.cfg" file in WordPad and edit the following lines to change the default setting manually:

SURFACE\_FX = True

to

SURFACE\_FX = False
